name: Around The Streets 2
description:
What you have to do?
Just roam around this small island and have fun driving your car!

Controls:
Arrow keys to control the player and the car.
Enter to enter/exit the car.
Esc to go to the main menu.
Thats all!

Whats new in ATS 2.1?
added traffic cars
new map
traffic cars stop when you go in front if them.
>>>*no lag while playing the game, super fast!*<<<

Have fun playing this game.
